name: Cube (itch) (CmGames)
description:
==============================================

For playing this prototype on Android or iOS, wireless keyboard is required!

==============================================

Mobile versions tested on:

Emulators: BlueStacks, Nox Player, MeMU

Phones: Xiaomi Redmi 9, Samsung Galaxy A20e

OS: Android: 5.1 / 7 / 10     

==============================================

Please Note!

This game is an Prototype, next versions will include bug fixes, levels, controller-support, touch support and more!

==============================================

Any donation will help us continuing developing this game!

==============================================
